ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week  I have drunk too much.
Notes: 0=Never; 1=1 or 2 Days; 2=3 or 4 Days; 3=5 or 6 Days; 4=Everyday

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have used street drugs
Notes: 0=Never; 1=1 or 2 Days; 2=3 or 4 Days; 3=5 or 6 Days; 4=Everyday

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have experienced cravings
Notes: 0=Never; 1=1 or 2 Days; 2=3 or 4 Days; 3=5 or 6 Days; 4=Everyday

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have coped with problems without misusing drugs or alcohol
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have managed pains and ill-health without misusing drugs or alcohol
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have been spending my free time on hobbies and interests that do not involve drugs or
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have been taking care of my mental health
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have been taking care of my physical health
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have been eating a good diet
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have slept well
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have had a good daily routine
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have been on well with people
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have felt supported by people around me
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have been treated with respect and consideration by people around me
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have treated others with respect and consideration
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have had stable housing
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have had a regular income (from benefits, work, or other legal sources)
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have been managing my money well
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have felt happy with my overall quality of life
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have felt positive
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, I have had realistic hopes and goals for myself
Notes: 0=All of the time; 1=Most of the time; 2=A fair amount of the time; 3=A little of the time; 4=None of the time

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, how important is reducing or abstaining from drinking or drug taking
Notes: 0=Not important; 1=A little important; 2=important; 3=Very important

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, how important is looking after yourself (physically taking care of yourself, mentally taking care of yourself, having a good diet, sleeping well, having a good routine)
Notes: 0=Not important; 1=A little important; 2=important; 3=Very important

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, how important is having good relationships with other people (getting on with people, feeling supported by people, being treated with respect, treating others with respect)
Notes: 0=Not important; 1=A little important; 2=important; 3=Very important

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, how important is having resources and belongings (stable housing, regular income, managing money)
Notes: 0=Not important; 1=A little important; 2=important; 3=Very important

ElementDescription: Thinking about the last week, how important is outlook on life (having a good quality of life, feeling positive, having realistic hopes and goals)
Notes: 0=Not important; 1=A little important; 2=important; 3=Very important

ElementDescription: Total SURE score
Notes: Sum of items sure01-sure21 converted to 3-point scale (1 point for items marked 0 or 1; 3 points for items marked 3 or 4)
